Oghwevwri bụ ofe mmanụ nkwụ agbariri agbari  nke ndị Urhobo nke Southern Nigeria riri
Aha "Oghwevwri" pụtara "mmanụ ofe" A na-eji azụ a na-ese anwụrụ ma ọ bụ nke a mịrị amị, anụ, ose, crayfish, potash na mmanụ nkwụ akwadebe ya
A na-erikarị ya na eba, usi (starch) ma ọ bụ yam
Oghwevwri bụ ofe pụrụ iche a na-enye ndị ọbịa na agbamakwụkwọ, olili ozu na ihe omume ọdịnala ndị ọzọ.
